newsitem.title: USA: Gibbs says poised to return to profit.
newsitem.headline: Gibbs says poised to return to profit.

text.p: Gibbs Construction Inc said Thursday it is poised to return to profitability in the last half of 1997.

The company said it has entered into contracts totalling more than $5 million for: Just for Feet Inc in Denver; Jo Anns Fabrics in Las Vegas; Pier 1 Imports Inc in Longmont, Colo.; and Microtel Hotels in Longview, Texas.

"With these new contracts, plus the $15 million of contracts completed or in progress, Gibbs Construction is poised for a return to profitability in the last half of 1997. The company's retail construction continues to be robust and should yield record revenues of approximately $50 million," the company said.
